Q1 2026 Implementation Roadmap

12-week plan from policy finalization to go-live

January 6, 2026 - Target Go-Live Date

3 MUST HAVE policies (Windfall, Section 409A, State Wage Law) effective for all new deals

Q2 2026: Add Clawback & Quota policies | Q3 2026: Add SPIF Governance policy

Phase 1

Weeks 1-3

0/4 milestones

Phase 2

Weeks 4-6

0/4 milestones

Phase 3

Weeks 7-9

0/4 milestones

Phase 4

Weeks 10-12

0/4 milestones

1

Policy Finalization & Legal Review

Weeks 1-3

NOT STARTED

Legal Review of 3 MUST HAVE Policies

CRITICAL

External counsel reviews Windfall/Large Deal, Section 409A, and State Wage Law policies

Owner: Legal / General Counsel

Compensation Committee Approval

CRITICAL

Present policies to Comp Committee for formal approval and sign-off

Owner: VP Compensation

Finalize Policy Documentation

Incorporate legal feedback, create final PDFs, version control setup

Owner: BHG Consulting

Policy Communication Plan

Draft rollout communications for managers, reps, and sales operations

Owner: HR Communications

2

CRB Establishment & System Setup

Weeks 4-6

NOT STARTED

Form Compensation Review Board (CRB)

CRITICAL

Select members, define charter, establish meeting cadence for windfall deal approvals

Owner: CFO / VP Compensation

Configure SGM Workflows

CRITICAL

Set up approval workflows, notification triggers, SLA tracking in SGM platform

Owner: IT / Sales Operations

Build Policy Templates in Systems

Configure Salesforce/comp system with new policy rules and validation checks

Owner: IT / Sales Operations

Create Exception Request Forms

Build online forms for reps to submit policy exception requests

Owner: IT / Sales Operations

3

Training & Documentation

Weeks 7-9

NOT STARTED

Manager Training Sessions

CRITICAL

Train regional sales managers on new policies, approval workflows, and SGM access

Owner: VP Sales / Training

Rep Communication & FAQs

CRITICAL

Publish policy summaries, FAQs, and training videos for all reps

Owner: HR / Training

CRB Training & Dry Runs

Train CRB members on windfall deal review process, run 3 test cases

Owner: BHG / VP Compensation

Sales Ops Desk Procedures

Create step-by-step procedures for sales ops team to administer policies

Owner: Sales Operations

4

Go-Live & Stabilization

Weeks 10-12

NOT STARTED

Policy Go-Live (January 6, 2026)

CRITICAL

All 3 MUST HAVE policies effective for new deals, CRB operational

Owner: VP Compensation

Daily Monitoring & Support

CRITICAL

Monitor SGM tickets, CRB queue, exception requests; provide rapid support

Owner: Sales Operations / BHG

First CRB Meeting

Review queued windfall deals, establish precedents, refine process

Owner: CRB Members

Two-Week Retrospective

Gather feedback from managers and reps, identify process improvements

Owner: VP Compensation

Key Dates & Dependencies

Week 3 Deadline (Dec 27, 2025)

Legal review complete and Comp Committee approval secured. Delay here pushes go-live date.

Week 6 Deadline (Jan 17, 2026)

CRB fully operational and SGM workflows live. Must be ready 2 weeks before go-live.

January 6, 2026 - GO-LIVE

All 3 MUST HAVE policies effective. CRB reviews first windfall deals. Daily support active.

Q2 & Q3 2026 - Phase 2

Add remaining 3 policies (Clawback, Quota, SPIF) using same 12-week playbook.

Critical Success Factors

Executive Sponsorship

CFO and VP Compensation must champion the changes and hold teams accountable

Legal Sign-Off

External counsel approval by Week 3 is non-negotiable to avoid compliance risk

IT Resources

2 FTE dedicated to SGM configuration and system integration (Weeks 4-6)

Change Management

Proactive communication to managers and reps reduces resistance and confusion

Next Steps to Start Phase 1

Engage external legal counsel for Section 409A and State Wage Law review

THIS WEEK

Schedule Compensation Committee meeting for policy approval (targeting Week 3)

THIS WEEK

Select CRB members (CFO, VP Sales, General Counsel, VP Comp recommended)

NEXT WEEK

Assign IT resources for SGM workflow configuration (2 FTE needed Weeks 4-6)

WEEK 2
